WorkItem.Description:
Can we have the option so the generated files don't getting attached into the solution?

I have the followings problems with the generated files included as a part of my solution:

1. When negating to file by name, (with Resharper: ctrl + shift + T), I have to choose the less file over the generated css files. 
2. Each time that I copy-paste less file,  in order to create a new one, I get an error that the css files already created.
3. After each copy-paste less file, in order to create a new one, I need to make my VisualHG to forget about the generated files, in order to don't get them source controlled.

Thanks for a great time saver project!
WorkItem.Summary: Don't attach .css and .min.css to the solutoin
